questions.question: Which is not a logical protection method?
Which is not a physical protection method?
Which example is a loss of Intellectual Property?
options: Designs for a new prototype could be stolen and copied or deleted
Failing to meet moral and legal obligations and losing personal data
Attacking a business’ servers will impact that business as well as any third parties
A direct physical threat to a country or a threat to the financial security of the state
questions.correct_answer: Designs for a new prototype could be stolen and copied or deleted

questions.question: Which is a principle of information security (CIA Triad)?
Which is not in a data flow diagram?
Which is not a rule in DFDs (Data Flow Diagrams)?
options: Every data flow connects to at least one process
Data flows only in one direction
Every data flow must go to or from a data store
questions.correct_answer: Every data flow must go to or from a data store

questions.question: What legislation provides the public with the right to access information about activities carried out by public authorities.
What is greenwashing?
options: Someone (typically a company) pretending to be greener than they actually are
A method of cleaning computer hardware using eco-friendly products.
An online scam where fake environmental charities ask for donations.
A technique for recycling old computer components into new ones.
questions.correct_answer: Someone (typically a company) pretending to be greener than they actually are

questions.question: How could a company implement green computing?
options: Using energy star labelled products - energy efficiency rating
Only using computers at night when electricity is cheaper
Disabling all security features to make devices run faster
Installing more RGB lighting to brighten up the workspace
questions.correct_answer: Using energy star labelled products - energy efficiency rating

questions.question: Which is not a stage of data analysis?
What would a customers address be classified as?
Which is not a characteristic of good quality information?
Identify the Act that requires internet service providers to keep a log of their customers’ use.
